nodes.name: forceDecrementVotes

activate(address).details: Pending votes cannot be activated until an election has been held.

params.group: The validator group to vote for.

canReceiveVotes(address,uint256).details: Votes are not allowed to be cast that would increase a group's proportion of locked gold  voting for it to greater than  (numGroupMembers + 1) / min(maxElectableValidators, numRegisteredValidators)Note that groups may still receive additional votes via rewards even if this function  returns false.

params.group: The address of the group.

canReceiveVotes(address,uint256).return: Whether or not a group can receive the specified number of votes.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

distributeEpochRewards(address,uint256,a.details: Can only be called directly by the protocol.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than `group` after the rewards are added.
params.group: The group whose voters will receive rewards.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than `group` after the rewards are added.
params.value: The amount of rewards to distribute to voters for the group.

params.greaters: The groups receivier more votes than the i'th `group`, or 0 if               the i'th `group` has the most votes of any validator group.
params.indices: The indices of the i'th group in the account's voting list.
params.lessers: The groups receiving fewer votes than the i'th `group`, or 0 if               the i'th `group` has the fewest votes of any validator group.
params.value: Maximum amount of votes to revoke.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

params.group: The address of the validator group.

getActiveVoteUnitsForGroup(address).return: The total active vote units made for `group`.

params.account: The address of the voting account.
params.group: The address of the validator group.

getActiveVoteUnitsForGroupByAccount(addr.return: The active vote units for `group` made by `account`.

getActiveVotes().return: The active votes received across all groups.

params.group: The address of the validator group.

params.account: The address of the voting account.
params.group: The address of the validator group.

getActiveVotesForGroupByAccount(address,.return: The active votes for `group` made by `account`.

getElectableValidators().return: The minimum and maximum number of validators that can be elected.

getEligibleValidatorGroups().return: The list of validator groups eligible to elect validators.

params.blockNumber: Block number where epoch number is calculated.

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getGroupEligibility(address).details: Eligible groups that have received their maximum number of votes cannot receive more.
getGroupEligibility(address).return: Whether or not a group is eligible to receive votes.

getGroupEpochRewards(address,uint256,uin.details: Eligible groups that have received their maximum number of votes cannot receive more.

params.group: The group to calculate epoch rewards for.
params.totalEpochRewards: The total amount of rewards going to all voters.
params.uptimes: Array of Fixidity representations of the validators' uptimes, between 0 and 1.

getGroupEpochRewards(address,uint256,uin.return: The amount of rewards that voters for `group` are due at the end of an epoch.

params.account: The address of the account casting votes.

getGroupsVotedForByAccount(address).return: The groups that `account` has voted for.

getNumVotesReceivable(address).details: Votes are not allowed to be cast that would increase a group's proportion of locked gold  voting for it to greater than  (numGroupMembers + 1) / min(maxElectableValidators, numRegisteredValidators)Note that a group's vote total may exceed this number through rewards or config changes.

params.group: The address of the group.

getNumVotesReceivable(address).return: The number of votes that a group can receive.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve. Must be within 4 epochs of the current number.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices corresponding to signing validators.

params.group: The address of the validator group.

params.account: The address of the voting account.
params.group: The address of the validator group.

getPendingVotesForGroupByAccount(address.return: The pending votes for `group` made by `account`.

getTotalVotes().return: The total votes received across all groups.

getTotalVotesByAccount(address).return: The total number of votes cast by an account.

getTotalVotesForEligibleValidatorGroups(.return: Lists of all validator groups and the number of votes they've received.

params.group: The address of the validator group.

params.account: The address of the voting account.
params.group: The address of the validator group.

getTotalVotesForGroupByAccount(address,a.return: The total votes for `group` made by `account`.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices correspoinding to signing validators.

getVersionNumber().return: The storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

hasActivatablePendingVotes(address,addre.details: Pending votes cannot be activated until an election has been held.

params.group: The validator group that `account` has pending votes for.

hasActivatablePendingVotes(address,addre.return: Whether or not `account` has activatable votes for `group`.

params._electabilityThreshold: The minimum ratio of votes a group needs before its members can  be elected.
params._maxNumGroupsVotedFor: The maximum number of groups that an account can vote for at once.
params.minElectableValidators: The minimum number of validators that can be elected.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry core smart contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

params.greater: The address of the group that has received more votes than this group.
params.group: The address of the validator group.
params.lesser: The address of the group that has received fewer votes than this group.

markGroupIneligible(address).details: Can only be called by the registered "Validators" contract.

params.group: The address of the validator group.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeActive(address,uint256,address,add.details: Fails if the account has not voted on a validator group.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the most votes of any validator group.
params.group: The validator group to revoke votes from.
params.index: The index of the group in the account's voting list.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the fewest votes of any validator group.
params.value: The number of votes to revoke.

revokeAllActive(address,address,address,.details: Fails if the account has not voted on a validator group.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the most votes of any validator group.
params.group: The validator group to revoke votes from.
params.index: The index of the group in the account's voting list.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the fewest votes of any validator group.

revokePending(address,uint256,address,ad.details: Fails if the account has not voted on a validator group.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the most votes of any validator group.
params.group: The validator group to revoke votes from.
params.index: The index of the group in the account's voting list.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the fewest votes of any validator group.
params.value: The number of votes to revoke.

params.max: The maximum number of validators that can be elected.
params.min: The minimum number of validators that can be elected.

params._maxNumGroupsVotedFor: The maximum number of groups an account can vote for.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.
params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

vote(address,uint256,address,address).details: Fails if `group` is empty or not a validator group.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than `group`, or 0 if `group` has the  most votes of any validator group.
params.group: The validator group to vote for.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than `group`, or 0 if `group` has the  fewest votes of any validator group.
params.value: The amount of gold to use to vote.

activate(address).notice: Converts `account`'s pending votes for `group` to active votes.

canReceiveVotes(address,uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a group can receive the specified number of votes.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

distributeEpochRewards(address,uint256,a.notice: Distributes epoch rewards to voters for `group` in the form of active votes.

electNValidatorSigners(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a list of elected validators with seats allocated to groups via the D'Hondt  method.

electValidatorSigners().notice: Returns a list of elected validators with seats allocated to groups via the D'Hondt  method.

forceDecrementVotes(address,uint256,addr.notice: Reduces the total amount of `account`'s voting gold by `value` by        iterating over all groups voted for by account.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getActiveVoteUnitsForGroup(address).notice: Returns the total active vote units made for `group`.

getActiveVoteUnitsForGroupByAccount(addr.notice: Returns the active vote units for `group` made by `account`.

getActiveVotes().notice: Returns the active votes received across all groups.

getActiveVotesForGroup(address).notice: Returns the active votes made for `group`.

getActiveVotesForGroupByAccount(address,.notice: Returns the active votes for `group` made by `account`.

getBlockNumberFromHeader(bytes).notice: Parses block number out of header.

getCurrentValidatorSigners().notice: Returns get current validator signers using the precompiles.

getElectableValidators().notice: Returns the minimum and maximum number of validators that can be elected.

getEligibleValidatorGroups().notice: Returns the list of validator groups eligible to elect validators.

getEpochNumber().notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochNumberOfBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getGroupEligibility(address).notice: Returns whether or not a group is eligible to receive votes.

getGroupEpochRewards(address,uint256,uin.notice: Returns the amount of rewards that voters for `group` are due at the end of an epoch.

getGroupsVotedForByAccount(address).notice: Returns the groups that `account` has voted for.

getNumVotesReceivable(address).notice: Returns the number of votes that a group can receive.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).notice: Gets the parent seal bitmap from the header at the given block number.

getPendingVotesForGroup(address).notice: Returns the pending votes made for `group`.

getPendingVotesForGroupByAccount(address.notice: Returns the pending votes for `group` made by `account`.

getTotalVotes().notice: Returns the total votes received across all groups.

getTotalVotesByAccount(address).notice: Returns the total number of votes cast by an account.

getTotalVotesForEligibleValidatorGroups(.notice: Returns lists of all validator groups and the number of votes they've received.

getTotalVotesForGroup(address).notice: Returns the total votes made for `group`.

getTotalVotesForGroupByAccount(address,a.notice: Returns the total votes for `group` made by `account`.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).notice: Verifies the BLS signature on the header and returns the seal bitmap. The validator set used for verification is retrieved based on the parent hash field of the header.  If the parent hash is not in the blockchain, verification fails.

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

hasActivatablePendingVotes(address,addre.notice: Returns whether or not an account's votes for the specified group can be activated.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

markGroupEligible(address,address,addres.notice: Marks a group eligible for electing validators.

markGroupIneligible(address).notice: Marks a group ineligible for electing validators.

minQuorumSize(uint256).notice: Returns the minimum number of required signers for a given block number.

minQuorumSizeInCurrentSet().notice: Computes byzantine quorum from current validator set size

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

numberValidatorsInSet(uint256).notice: Gets the size of the validator set that must sign the given block number.

setElectableValidators(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the minimum and maximum number of validators that can be elected.

setMaxNumGroupsVotedFor(uint256).notice: Updates the maximum number of groups an account can be voting for at once.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.notice: Gets a validator address from the validator set at the given block number.

vote(address,uint256,address,address).notice: Increments the number of total and pending votes for `group`.
